title: A title for the Family Tree
subtitle: Example of a subtitle: "From ancestors to future generations, from the roots to the top"
tutorial: Use scroll for zooming and drag & drop to move around.
text_columns:
This is an example of a Family Tree.

See how to create your own on SunTree Family Tree web-site.

You can add any content here.

For example, some information about the first known ancestor or a link for more information.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out us on GitHub.
print_columns:
This is an example of the print version of a Family Tree.

See how to create your own on SunTree Family Tree.

You can add any content here.

For example, some information about the first known ancestor or a link for more information.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out us on GitHub.
You can also add a link to online version example.family--tree.org
